alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Dinwiddie; Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Henrico; New Kent; Prince George; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 11:16PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CHESTERFIELD...CHARLES CITY... NORTHERN PRINCE GEORGE...NEW KENT...HENRICO...SOUTHEASTERN HANOVER... SOUTHEASTERN KING WILLIAM AND NORTHEASTERN DINWIDDIE COUNTIES...THE CITY OF RICHMOND...THE CITY OF COLONIAL HEIGHTS...THE CITY OF HOPEWELL AND THE CITY OF PETERSBURG THROUGH MIDNIGHT EST... At 1115 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from Virginia Union University to Chesterfield Court House to near Sutherland. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Richmond, Virginia Union University, Chester, Mechanicsville, Highland Springs, Downtown Richmond, Virginia Commonwealth University, Matoaca, East Highland Park, and Sutherland around 1120 PM EST. Petersburg, Colonial Heights, Virginia State University, and Ettrick around 1125 PM EST. Hopewell and Fort Gregg-Adams around 1130 PM EST. Bottoms Bridge around 1135 PM EST. Roxbury, Prince George, Jordans Point, and Tunstall around 1140 PM EST. Talleysville, Garysville, Adkins Store, and Providence Forge around 1145 PM EST. New Kent, Charles City, and Ruthville around 1150 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Wayside, Richmond Heights, Birchett Estate, Addison, Mountcastle, Elko, Jordan Point Country Club, Cohoke, Montrose, and Petersburg National Battlefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
